Class FileOperations

public class FileOperations
extends java.lang.Object

Class implementing functionality for reading and writing to files

Author:
Tim Hughes (Computational Biology Unit - University of Bergen - Norway)

getPrintWriter

public static java.io.PrintWriter getPrintWriter(java.lang.String filePath)
                                          throws OutputFileAccessException
Gets a PrintWriter to the specified file, prints message to standard out and exits if the file already exists or if unable to get PrintWriter to file.

Parameters:
filePath - String identifying file to which PrintWriter is needed
Returns:
PrinterWriter to spcified file with autoflushing switched on
Throws:
OutputFileAccessException
